Name: BeatPlane
About the game: This is a very interesting air combat game. In this game, you can experience a very awesome shooting effect, and a large number of enemies can also give you a very interesting fighting experience. Every challenge in the game is a test of your technology. Let's fight together and fly in the blue sky! Main tasks of the game: Control your plane, avoid bullets, and survive (hit=dead)! Main features of the game: -Quickly avoid the enemy, so that you can persist in the battlefield longer, you can defeat the enemy. -When we find out the rules, we can defeat these enemies more easily. Operating instructions: Keep pressing and holding the left mouse button to guide the aircraft to move and avoid the enemy!
